name: Robot Robot (Hugison)
description:
In Robot Robot you play as two robots who must help each other to solve the puzzles. 

Here are the rules: each robot always moves until it gets blocked by an obstacle like the end of the floor, boxes or even the other robot.  Each robot has to stand on the switch of the same color to comlete the level. 

Very simple, right? But the solution is not always simple.  You will have to be clever and think out of the box sometimes to get the perfect score. 

You can play in local co-op or move both robots alone. 

Controls: 

Move: WASD (blue); Arrow Keys (orange)

Push: E (blue); Right shift (orange)

Restart level: R

Next Level: Enter

Back to Menu: Escape

I won't work further on this game for now but will probably return to it some day. So let me know if you would like to play more Robot Robot. Any  feedback is still aprreciated.

This game was originally created for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. You can play the jam version (less levels and some bugs) of the game here if you want (not recommended):

https://hugison.itch.io/robot-robot

If you want to stay update on my gamedev journey you can do so on twitter:

https://twitter.com/HugisonGames
